abstract: The Chinese property and entertainment conglomerate has purchased a 68.2 percent stake in Infront Sports and Media from Bridgepoint, a European private equity firm.

headline.main: Wanda Group to Buy Marketing Firm for $1.2 Billion

snippet: The Chinese property and entertainment conglomerate has purchased a 68.2 percent stake in Infront Sports and Media from Bridgepoint, a European private equity firm.
